channel.title: Ventrilo
channel.description:
I was wondering, I host my own ventrilo server and I can't have more then 8 slots because I don't pay for it. Is there anyway besides having to pay for the server and have more the 8 slots like a torrent. I did a bit of research on it and found nothing. ~ Also, I was thinking on going TeamSpeak instead, but I heard and from personal experience seen peoples TeamSpeak servers easily get hacked.
Just wanted to know if there is anyway around the 8 slot thing.

item.title: Ventrilo
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:3, topic:159794”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=217550.msg1892618#msg1892618 date=1195794563]
why not just use an irc?
[/quote]
IRC is only text chat - Ventrillo is voice chat. Why go backwards?[/quote]
because he said he can’t find a server for free, and irc is free ( if you don’t have your own network) mopar doesn’t have to pay a penny for the irc. but he does already have hosting so…

Read full topic
